fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, sculpt a beautiful, realistic statue of a player out of chocolate
- Give your sculpture to the player you sculpted

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Once you give your sculpture to a player, they will receive a powerful autovest that breaks when theyâ€™re attacked
- You start the game with a statue of yourself already made. You may not make another statue of yourself
